title: "What does your name mean"
body:
where did YOU get your name from?
I always get that question, but I wanted a chance to explain my own name and ask about yours at the same time.
Everyone should have pride in their name. Sure
 there're summoners with names like "archu6" but even those can be a mix of two pokemon or something.

My name comes from Abracadabra, if you look up the word there's a charm that uses an anagram of the word. It's actually a pretty cool word in that respect. "Abracadabra" means "I create as I speak. "Avada kedavra" means I destroy as I speak. Why the numbers? Well since the anagram didn't really focus on letters, I thought it could be substituted for numbers for every abstract or different character. So 12314151231 was born lol

That doesn't stop people from thinking its a phone number!
Where'd you get your name?
